strIntroduction: What You'll Do Enjoy a 1.5-hour private instruction where you will familiarize with the most popular Greek dances as long as interesting info about their history Enjoy careful instruction from a well-informed, enthusiastic dance teacher who will show you the steps of syrtaki, kalamatianos & other Greek dances! Grab a seat at your table and tuck into a tasty spread of Greek fare, listening to live music as you enjoy your delicious dinner. Get to know a powerful culture trait of Greek people, dance, and the meaning of it in their social life. See authentic, traditional Greek folk dancing costumes. Two participants in each group will wear them and take some photos!
